name: rm
longDescription: This  manual  page  documents the GNU version of rm.  rm removes each specified file.  By default, it does not remove directories.

options.name: i
options.description: Prompt whether to remove each file.  If the response is not affirmative, the file is skipped.  Ignore any previous ‘--force’ (‘-f’) option.  Equivalent to ‘--interactive=always’.

options.name: I
options.description: Prompt once whether to proceed with the command, if more than three files are named or if a recursive removal is requested.  Ignore any previous ‘--force’ (‘-f’) option.  Equivalent to ‘--interactive=once’.

options.name: R
options.description: Remove the listed directories and their contents recursively.

options.name: force
options.description: Ignore nonexistent files and missing operands, and never prompt the user.  Ignore any previous ‘--interactive’ (‘-i’) option.

options.name: interactive
options.description: Specify when to issue an interactive prompt.  WHEN may be omitted, or one of: • never - Do not prompt at all. • once - Prompt once if more than three files are named or if a recursive removal is requested.  Equivalent to ‘-I’. • always - Prompt for every file being removed.  Equivalent to ‘-i’. ‘--interactive’ with no WHEN is equivalent to ‘--interactive=always’.

options.name: one-file-system
options.description: When removing a hierarchy recursively, skip any directory that is on a file system different from that of the corresponding command line argument.

options.name: no-preserve-root
options.description: Do not treat ‘/’ specially when removing recursively.  This option is not recommended unless you really want to remove all the files on your computer.

options.name: preserve-root
options.description: Fail upon any attempt to remove the root directory, ‘/’, when used with the ‘--recursive’ option.  This is the default behavior.

options.name: recursive
options.description: Remove the listed directories and their contents recursively.

options.name: dir
options.description: Remove the listed directories if they are empty.

options.name: verbose
options.description: Print the name of each file before removing it.
